General.Name: Osisko Green Acquisition Ltd
General.Description: Osisko Green Acquisition Limited does not have significant operations. It intends to effect an acquisition of one or more businesses or assets by merger, amalgamation, arrangement, share exchange, asset acquisition, share purchase, reorganization, or other similar business combination. The company was incorporated in 2021 and is headquartered in Toronto, Canada.
